title: Foreign Language Vocabulary Learning Design Using Educational Videos

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language grammar and reading comprehension skills
context.additional_context: Foreign language vocabulary learning through real-time video conferencing in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, measuring learning outcomes via project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately understand and utilize 200 essential foreign language vocabulary words in context over four weeks.
After watching educational videos, learners can achieve 80% or higher accuracy in vocabulary memorization through quizzes.
Through project assignments linked to video content, learners can demonstrate the ability to apply vocabulary in real-life situations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
